These goiters typically occur in adulthood and most often do not cause symptoms. This syndrome is caused by mutations in the DICER1 gene. It is passed through families in an autosomal dominant fashion. Affected members in the same family can be very differently affected.",GARD,DICER1-related pleuropulmonary blastoma cancer predisposition syndrome
